description: Situated amid the attractive alleyways in the centre of Rho, this simple yet pleasant and friendly restaurant serves delicious local cuisine. Abruzzo specialities are to the fore, including dishes such as spaghetti alla chitarra with meatballs in sauce, various mutton recipes (grilled on skewers, tartare, steaks etc), lamb and different types of ham.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
